Users can choose Kim Soo-yeon's choice to increase her favorability, or Hwang Jin-ah's choice to increase her favorability. Users can increase their affinity with the heroine and view the 8 endings through various challenges. *This game is optimized for 1920*1080 (FHD) quality. ■How to operate ======= Left-click: Select and expand text Mouse wheel: Rollback of previous and subsequent metabolism Keyboard TAB Button: Skip Torque Keyboard CTRL button: Skip Keyboard SPACE button: Hide Metabolism
